text: (yusuhp avalai vittum tappi ota muyanru) oruvarai oruvar muntik kolla vacalin pakkam otinarkal; aval avarutaiya cattaiyaip pinpurattil kilittu vittal; appotu avalutaiya kanavarai vacal pakkam iruvarum kantanar. Utan (tan kurrattai maraikka)"um manaivikkut tinkilaikka natiya ivarukkuc ciraiyilitappatuvato allatu novinai tarum vetanaiyait taruvato anri veru enna tantanai irukkamutiyum?" Enru kettal
